subtitles.text: Okay, so this time I'm going to challenge an actual race with my original car that I made in the last video.
I'm so glad it's finally here!
By the way, when you appeared on the show, did you leave any impression about the contents of this latest Holzer video?
When you appeared on the show, was there anything that impressed you about the contents of Holzer's latest work, Mirei?
I think it was mentioned that the evolution of ai is amazing.
The simulation reproduces the road, the road, the ground, the unevenness of the ground, and so on, in detail.
Even looking at it like this, it's very detailed.
Yes, you can see the three-dimensional effect in great detail.
You can also see the glossy feeling of the car body.
You can also see the luster of the car body.
If I couldn't see everything from here to there, I wouldn't be able to see anything.
If I could only see the screen, I would feel as if I were really on the track.
It's true, you feel as if you are actually on the track.
I feel as if I'm actually on the track.
The realism of the video really blinds you to the importance of this road, doesn't it?
That's right, I didn't know that.
I thought car games were just about the cars looking cool.
I felt that it wasn't like that.
Was there anything that left an impression on you?
Well, I'm interested in the realistic Suzuka Circuit that I've been to.
I wonder how realistic it is.
I'm really looking forward to being able to feel like I've been there again.
It's wonderful that you put so much effort into the scenery and so on. It's wonderful that you're so particular about the scenery and all that.
Now let's try our hand at racing!
It's the Grand Prix of Ebituaries at Forza Motorsports!
It's simple, but it's a car game, so let's see who's the fastest among the three of us!
It's a simple game, so let's see who's the fastest out of the three of us!
And you know, before we race, we're going to compete with each other to see who's the fastest.
But I think it's better to practice first.
First of all, we're going to practice, and to some extent, we're going to try to match each other's ability.
Shall we go to one race to see how good we are?
Each of us will start the race.
The way you're doing it, it's beautiful.
I feel like this crowd is cheering me on. I'm kind of glad this crowd is cheering me on.
When you're running well, you're so smooth.
On the other hand, when you're not running well, it's like the controller doesn't really work for you.
I love it when it's not going well.
Oh, man, I wasn't doing it at all.
I drove the car as fast as I could. I usually don't drive this fast.
Straight line! I'm so proud of myself when I get to the straight line!
It's hard to get a straight line, but when it's a little to the left, it's not good.
It's hard... when the trajectory is off...
If you do it while fisching the brake, it's...
It's going to be a real wreck.

Who will be first and who will be last?

I'm sure you have a sketchbook on hand.
Please try to write in each of them!
Let's open it all at once.
Oh, you put yourself in third place?
I think I'm already in first place with this controller.
I think I'm going to have to practice a little bit.
I think I'm going to grab the court and get first place.

It's taking me a long time to get to this stage of practice.

I think it's nice and tight.

I'm sure we'll run into some kind of trouble.

I would like to try different types of cars, like sharp ones or round ones. I wanted to see how it would feel to change the type of car, like sharp or round.
I think it is a dream come true for car lovers.
I think it's a dream come true for car enthusiasts.
Even those who were not interested in cars to begin with, being able to customize their own cars in this way is, in a way, like being a doll in a strange world.
So, I think this is a new way to enjoy cars, and I think that cars are more familiar to people than the Kiwai Dolls.
I hope that many people will give it a try.Hmmm...

So, I would like to get together with the three of us again, and this time, I would like to win the first place.
I want to do it. That's why.
Yes, I want to do it.
